house_listing.house_description: Great location in the heart of kempsville.So much to offer, convenient, comfortable & cozy townhouse. Spacious bedrooms, pull down attic stairs.Lots of extra storage space, blinds & appliances convey, driveway parking behind unit, large utility room w/side door to back patio
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Pantry, Utility Room
